item.title: Dark mode flickers a white background for a fraction of a second
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: The dark mode feature uses local storage to store a user’s preference for future usage. The problem is that when the dark mode is enabled and the page is reloaded, there’s a flicker of white background all over the page before it turns dark.
